amendment.description: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 10 East Commerce Street in Youngstown, Ohio, as the "Nathaniel R. Jones Federal Building and United States Courthouse."

vote.text: Amendment SA 96 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 96 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S1405-1406; text: CR S1405) To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 10 East Commerce Street in Youngstown, Ohio, as the "Nathaniel R. Jones Federal Building and United States Courthouse."
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 96 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 96 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich.
